mapper.update: UPDATE stocks s JOIN products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id SET s.stock_qr_code_path = #{stockQrCodePath}, s.stock_qr_code_data = #{stockQrCodeData}, s.updated_at = NOW() WHERE s.product_id = #{productId};
mapper.select: SELECT s.stock_id, s.product_id, p.product_barcode, s.stock_qr_code_path, s.stock_qr_code_data, s.updated_at FROM stocks s JOIN products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id WHERE p.product_barcode = #{productBarcode};
SELECT s.stock_id, s.product_id, p.product_barcode, s.stock_qr_code_path, s.updated_at FROM stocks s JOIN products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id WHERE s.product_id = #{productId} LIMIT 1;

SELECT s.stock_id, p.product_barcode AS productBarcode, s.stock_qr_code_path AS stockQrCodePath FROM stocks s JOIN products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id WHERE p.business_id = #{businessId} AND s.is_deleted = 0 AND s.stock_qr_code_path IS NOT NULL;
mapper.update: UPDATE stocks s JOIN products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id SET s.stock_qr_code_path = NULL, s.stock_qr_code_data = NULL, s.updated_at = NOW() WHERE p.product_barcode = #{productBarcode};
